689757770300690432.text: Highlights of my speech # EU2016EN #EPlenary https://t.co/V8fV3uHt4E

689728212591628288.text: "A key goal of the presidency is to move forward with all existing initiatives at innovative growth and more jobs." # EU2016EN #EPlenary

689728041312980992.text: "The refugee crisis is a priority of the NL Presidency. At the same time, we can not lose sight of our long-term goals. "# EU2016EN #EPlenary

689727604128112640.text: "Keeping promises and sticking to agreements should be the new normal for Europe." # EU2016EN #EPlenary

689727431008243712.text: "The EU does not need new lofty ideals or grand designs. It needs results. It needs to deliver. "# EU2016EN #EPlenary

689727149260029952.text: "We can be proud of the EU's achievements. But we must be vigilant. Our achievements need maintenance. "# EU2016EN #EPlenary

689726204207878144.text: "Problems such as the refugee crisis, can not be solved by a single country. European nations share a big responsibility. "# EU2016EN #EPlenary

689725809972637696.text: "The EU needs to stick to areas where it can be achieved." # EU2016EN #EPlenary
